name: ChaosCostaMesa
0:
”Alexa, play Chaos Costa Mesa”
”Alexa, open Chaos Costa Mesa”
”Alexa, start Chaos Costa Mesa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chaos costa mesa
des: Burglars flee homes or apartments they break into if they think police are on the way. CHAOS Costa Mesa plays a recorded soundtrack of Costa Mesa, CA police responding to actual calls. You turn CHAOS Costa Mesa on when you leave your home and it runs on a loop until you turn it off when you return. If someone comes into your house the first thing they will hear is police radio chatter and they will probably assume police are rolling. The soundtrack has local, Costa Mesa references so it's perfectly authentic. Here's a product video that explains the skill: https://youtu.be/IIc3Yp3g8qk
